documentation.text:
alculate and return (newAmount, newSlope), using formula:
 staking = (tokens * (
      ST_FORMULA_CONST_MULTIPLIER
      + ST_FORMULA_CLIFF_MULTIPLIER * (cliffPeriod - minCliffPeriod))/(TWO_YEAR_WEEKS - minCliffPeriod)
      + ST_FORMULA_SLOPE_MULTIPLIER * (slopePeriod - minSlopePeriod))/(TWO_YEAR_WEEKS - minSlopePeriod)
      )) / ST_FORMULA_DIVIDER*

attributes.text:
alculate and return (newAmount, newSlope), using formula:
 staking = (tokens * (
      ST_FORMULA_CONST_MULTIPLIER
      + ST_FORMULA_CLIFF_MULTIPLIER * (cliffPeriod - minCliffPeriod))/(TWO_YEAR_WEEKS - minCliffPeriod)
      + ST_FORMULA_SLOPE_MULTIPLIER * (slopePeriod - minSlopePeriod))/(TWO_YEAR_WEEKS - minSlopePeriod)
      )) / ST_FORMULA_DIVIDER*

Delegate(uint256,address,address,uint256.details: Emitted when to set newDelegate address for Lock with given id

Migrate(address,uint256[]).details: Emitted when migrate Locks with given id, account - msg.sender

Restake(uint256,address,address,uint256,.details: Emitted when change Lock parameters (newDelegate, newAmount, newSlope, newCliff) for Lock with given id

StakeCreate(uint256,address,address,uint.details: Emitted when create Lock with parameters (account, delegate, amount, slope, cliff)

StartMigration(address,address).details: StartMigration initiate migration to another contract, account - msg.sender, to - address delegate to

StopStaking(address).details: Stop run contract functions, accept withdraw, account - msg.sender

Withdraw(address,uint256).details: Emitted when withdraw amount of Rari, account - msg.sender, amount - amount Rari

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

migrateTo.details: address to migrate Stakes to (zero if not in migration state)

minCliffPeriod.details: minimal cliff period in weeks, minCliffPeriod < TWO_YEAR_WEEKS

minSlopePeriod.details: minimal slope period in weeks, minSlopePeriod < TWO_YEAR_WEEKS

stopped.details: true if contract entered stopped state

getStake(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: alculate and return (newAmount, newSlope), using formula: staking = (tokens * (      ST_FORMULA_CONST_MULTIPLIER      + ST_FORMULA_CLIFF_MULTIPLIER * (cliffPeriod - minCliffPeriod))/(TWO_YEAR_WEEKS - minCliffPeriod)      + ST_FORMULA_SLOPE_MULTIPLIER * (slopePeriod - minSlopePeriod))/(TWO_YEAR_WEEKS - minSlopePeriod)      )) / ST_FORMULA_DIVIDER*
